医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示具有广泛抗体反应的通用流感疫苗的潜力研究讨论了通用流感疫苗的潜力，强调了抗体广度和 Fc 受体 (FcR) 效应器功能在预防各种流感病毒株（包括具有大流行潜力的流感病毒株）方面的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-shows-pottial-for-universal-flu-vaccine-with-broad-antibody-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-shows-pottial-for-universal-flu-vaccine-with-broad-antibody-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbb439a6-2ab5-4c44-90b3-eec6de24aca0 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 20:52:00 -0400 Study shows potential for universal flu vaccine with broad antibody response
研究发现，烘焙绿茶可提高脑力任务表现研究调查了绿茶和烘焙绿茶的消费如何影响人类在精神任务中的反应，证明烘焙绿茶可以提高表现并减少疲劳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Roasted-green-tea-boosts-mental-task-performance-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Roasted-green-tea-boosts-mental-task-performance-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=450d595c-59cc-4598-beed-824138f25dae Mon, 15 Apr 2024 20:37:00 -0400 Roasted green tea boosts mental task performance, study finds
氯胺酮对抑郁症的快速影响与免疫系统途径有关研究揭示了氯胺酮对神经系统疾病具有强大的抗炎作用，显示出通过调节神经免疫途径治疗重度抑郁症的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Ketamines-rapid-impact-on-depression-linked-to-immune-system-pathways.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Ketamines-rapid-impact-on-depression-linked-to-immune-system-pathways.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08e84a9a-004f-4900-b03f-8a0f42cd1f66 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 19:18:00 -0400 Ketamine's rapid impact on depression linked to immune system pathways
早期摄入豆类与幼儿更好的营养有关研究表明，食用豆类和扁豆等豆类的幼儿表现出改善的饮食质量，在生命的关键头两年显着增加了他们的营养摄入量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Early-legume-intake-linked-to-better-nutrition-in-toddlers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Early-legume-intake-linked-to-better-nutrition-in-toddlers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdfa41cd-d22e-4d8c-87bc-92bd84191f46 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 19:07:00 -0400 Early legume intake linked to better nutrition in toddlers
基因工程皮肤细菌可对抗癌症在研究一种生活在每个人健康皮肤上的细菌时，斯坦福大学医学院的研究人员和一位同事可能偶然发现了一种强大的抗癌新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Genetically-engineering-skin-bacteria-to-fight-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Genetically-engineering-skin-bacteria-to-fight-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2905ad46-d072-4995-a93a-9359372d6274 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 15:44:31 -0400 Genetically engineering skin bacteria to fight cancer
第一份综合图谱为与年龄相关的肌肉变化的过程提供了新的线索现在，通过第一个人类衰老肌肉综合图谱，可以在细胞和分子水平上更好地了解肌肉如何随着衰老而变化，并试图对抗其影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/First-compressive-atlas-sheds-new-light-on-processes-underlying-age-lated-muscle-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/First-compressive-atlas-sheds-new-light-on-processes-underlying-age-lated-muscle-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6919ccec-ee12-42b7-b5d8-fcd141cd561e Mon, 15 Apr 2024 13:21:00 -0400 First comprehensive atlas sheds new light on processes underlying age-related muscle changes
日本研究揭示乳制品摄入量与奇数碳链脂肪酸之间的联系东北大学研究人员最近的一项研究揭示了日本人口中乳制品消费与奇数碳链脂肪酸 (odd-FA) 之间的关联，这一相关性此前已在欧洲和大洋洲得到证实，但在亚洲国家尚未得到充分研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/ Japanese-study-reveals-link- Between-dairy-intake-and-odd-number-carbon-chain-fatty-acids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/ Japanese-study-reveals-link- Between-dairy-intake-and-odd-number-carbon-chain-fatty-acids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9da4cc4b-c91a-442c-bcd0-aecd5f18d2f8 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 13:14:00 -0400 Japanese study reveals link between dairy intake and odd-number carbon chain fatty acids
体力活动可减少与压力相关的大脑活动，从而降低心血管疾病的风险新的研究表明，体力活动可以部分通过减少大脑中与压力相关的信号传导来降低心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Physical-activity-lowers-cardioangio-disease-risk-by-reducing-stress-lated-brain-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Physical-activity-lowers-cardioangio-disease-risk-by-reducing-stress-lated-brain-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f6f6855-b0cd-4e9f-99ac-0e9d142a48cc Mon, 15 Apr 2024 13:05:00 -0400 Physical activity lowers cardiovascular disease risk by reducing stress-related brain activity
研究显示加拿大青少年阿片类药物死亡人数惊人上升根据 CMAJ 发表的最新研究，2019 年至 2021 年间，加拿大各地与阿片类药物相关的过早死亡人数增加了一倍，20-39 岁的年轻人中，超过四分之一的死亡归因于阿片类药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-reveals-shocking-rise-in-opioid-deaths-among-Canadian-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-reveals-shocking-rise-in-opioid-deaths-among-Canadian-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08831812-b4ae-4326-9e72-c83a67557fde Mon, 15 Apr 2024 12:57:00 -0400 Study reveals shocking rise in opioid deaths among Canadian youth
研究揭示肺结核幸存者的持久肺损伤今年在西班牙巴塞罗那举行的 ESCMID 全球大会（前身为 ECCMID）（4 月 27 日至 30 日）上提出的新研究发现了令人信服的证据，表明结核病 (TB) 可以对已成功治疗肺结核 (TB) 的个体的肺部产生持久影响。疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-reveals- permanent-lung-damage-in-tuberculosis-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-reveals- permanent-lung-damage-in-tuberculosis-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ecfb5c3-0516-48fc-b772-9fa326cf4c87 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 12:40:09 -0400 Study reveals lasting lung damage in tuberculosis survivors
